mapper.insert: insert into store (name, logo, description, address, phone, avg_price, sale_from, sale_to, category, user_id) values (#{name}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{avg_price}, #{sale_from}, #{sale_to}, #{category}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select s.store_id, s.name, s.logo, s.description, s.created_at, s.address, s.phone, s.avg_price, s.sale_from, s.sale_to, s.category, u.user_id, u.username, u.phone from store s, user u where s.user_id = #{user_id} and s.user_id = u.user_id
